评论概述: Not what it seemed, yet well-handled by site
评论详情: I ordered Black43.  This item appealed to me greatly. However, even ordering in the largest size available (a large, which is what I normally wear), it fit like a small and I could not even get it up past my thighs. Additionally, the small chain links are like paper and tear at nothing; the shiny aesthetic parts of this outfit had no probability of longevity. And, the suspenders had no adjustment pieces, so if one wanted to wear them up instead of hanging, there'd be no guarantee that the suspenders would fit the wearer's body.  That being said, the site granted me a full refund. And when I encountered a series of difficulties shipping it back to China, they allowed me to simply keep the money and not bother shipping back. I was pleased with how this turned out in the end, as disappointing as the product itself was.

Idk what I was expecting but the quality of these pants is horrible. It's like if you found a costume at a Halloween store that said "goth" You can see right through the fabric like it's make of tissue paper.. The chains are connected to the straps by tiny little chain link at the ends which are extremely fragile, and they run small.

Brings back fond memories of the 90s and early 2000s. This style is great for party, rock show, and other events. They arent built to last forever, however they are great as a fashion statement and comfortable form fitting to wear.
